topic: AI Research and Technology

  entities:
    Adobe|Organization
    FireFly|Toolkit
    FAIR Act|Regulation
    Apple|Organization
    ChatGLM-RLHF|Model
    Tsinghua University|Research Institution
    THUDM Lab|Research Group
    CogView-3-Plus|Model
    AlignBench|Benchmark
    AutoDetect|Framework
    Microsoft COCO|Dataset
    ImageNet|Dataset
    CLIPScore|Metric
    GANs|Technological Concept

  proposition: Adobe offers FireFly and maintains a security trust center
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Adobe|PROVIDES|FireFly
    Adobe|MAINTAINS|security trust center

    entity-entity relationships:
    Adobe|DEVELOPS|FireFly

  proposition: Adobe advocates for the FAIR Act to protect artists in the AI era
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Adobe|SUPPORTS|FAIR Act

    entity-entity relationships:
    Adobe|ADVOCATES_FOR|FAIR Act

  proposition: Apple has developed intelligence foundation language models
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Apple|DEVELOPS|intelligence foundation language models

  proposition: ChatGLM-RLHF practices aligning large language models with human feedback
    entity-attribute relationships:
    ChatGLM-RLHF|FOCUSES_ON|aligning large language models with human feedback

  proposition: Tsinghua University THUDM Lab developed CogView-3-Plus
    entity-entity relationships:
    Tsinghua University|HOSTS|THUDM Lab
    THUDM Lab|DEVELOPS|CogView-3-Plus

  proposition: Research on black-box prompt optimization for large language models
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Research|FOCUSES_ON|black-box prompt optimization for large language models

  proposition: AlignBench benchmarks Chinese alignment of large language models
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AlignBench|EVALUATES|Chinese alignment of large language models

  proposition: AutoDetect framework for automated weakness detection in large language models
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AutoDetect|PROVIDES|automated weakness detection in large language models

topic: Computer Vision and Image Generation

  entities:
    Latent Diffusion Models|Technological Concept
    Microsoft COCO|Dataset
    ImageNet|Dataset
    Deep Convolutional Neural Networks|Model Architecture
    Generative Adversarial Networks|Technological Concept
    CLIPScore|Metric
    Scene Graph|Method

  proposition: High-resolution image synthesis is possible with latent diffusion models
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Latent Diffusion Models|ENABLES|high-resolution image synthesis

  proposition: Microsoft COCO dataset provides common objects in context
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Microsoft COCO|CONTAINS|common objects in context

  proposition: ImageNet classification uses deep convolutional neural networks
    entity-attribute relationships:
    ImageNet|USES|deep convolutional neural networks

  proposition: Research exists on training generative adversarial networks
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Research|FOCUSES_ON|training generative adversarial networks

  proposition: Techniques for improving GAN training have been proposed
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative Adversarial Networks|IMPROVES|training techniques

  proposition: CLIPScore offers a reference-free evaluation metric for image captioning
    entity-attribute relationships:
    CLIPScore|PROVIDES|reference-free evaluation metric for image captioning

  proposition: Text-to-image faithfulness can be evaluated using question answering techniques
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Text-to-image|EVALUATES|faithfulness using question answering techniques

  proposition: Scene graph evaluation can improve reliability in text-image generation assessment
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Scene Graph|IMPROVES|reliability in text-image generation assessment
